      • getJdbcRDBMSDirectory

        public static RDBMSLuceneDirectory getJdbcRDBMSDirectory(String directoryName,
                                         OraclePool[] pool)
                                                  throws OracleIndexException
        Creates an RDBMSLuceneDirectory object using a single Oracle JDBC sub-directory.
        Parameters:
        directoryName - the name of this directory.
        pool - an array of OraclePool objects specifying the storage of the JDBC directories.
        Returns:
        an RDBMSLuceneDirectory object.
        Throws:
        IOException
        OracleIndexException

      • getJdbcRDBMSDirectory

        public static RDBMSLuceneDirectory getJdbcRDBMSDirectory(String directoryName,
                                         OraclePool[] pool,
                                         int numSubDirs)
                                                  throws OracleIndexException
        Creates an RDBMSLuceneDirectory object using Oracle JDBC sub-directories.
        Parameters:
        directoryName - the name of this directory.
        pool - an array of OraclePool objects specifying the storage of the JDBC directories.
        numSubDirs - the number of sub-directories to use in this Directory.
        Returns:
        an RDBMSLuceneDirectory object.
        Throws:
        IOException
        OracleIndexException
